io.spine.validate

Class ExceptionFactory<E extends java.lang.Exception,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends MessageClass<?>,R extends com.google.protobuf.ProtocolMessageEnum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.validate.ExceptionFactory<E,M,C,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of Exception to build
    M - type of the Message
    C - type of the MessageClass of |M|.
    R - type of an error code to use for error reporting; must be a Protobuf enum value

    @Internal
public abstract class ExceptionFactory<E extends java.lang.Exception,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends MessageClass<?>,R extends com.google.protobuf.ProtocolMessageEnum>
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for building exceptions used to report invalid Messages, which have fields that violate validation constraint(s).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ExceptionFactory(M message, java.lang.Iterable<ConstraintViolation> violations)
      Creates an ExceptionFactory instance for a given message and constraint violations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract E createException(java.lang.String exceptionMsg, M message, Error error)
      Defines the way to create an instance of exception basing on the source Message, exception text, and a generated Error.
      protected abstract R getErrorCode()
      Obtains an error code to use for error reporting.
      protected abstract java.lang.String getErrorText()
      Obtains an error text to use for error reporting.
      protected abstract C getMessageClass()
      Obtains a MessageClass for an invalid Message.
      protected abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.google.protobuf.Value> getMessageTypeAttribute(com.google.protobuf.Message message)
      Obtains the Message-specific type attributes for error reporting.
      E newException()
      Creates an exception instance for an invalid message which has fields that violate validation constraint(s).

        Creates an ExceptionFactory instance for a given message and constraint violations.
